Package stocker.view

Class Watchlist

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • stocker.view.Watchlist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, IStockerDataListener
    public class Watchlist
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
implements IStockerDataListener
    An internal frame showing current data of a WatchlistItem in a table.
    Author:
    Marc S. Schneider
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Watchlist

        public Watchlist​(StockerFrame parent,
                 StockerControl control)
        Construct a new Watchlist.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent window (i.e. the main frame, a StockerFrame)
        control - the StockerControl which is controlling this application

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem​(WatchlistItem newitem)
        Add a new item to this watchlist (automatically triggers pulling a quote and subscription to push).
        Parameters:
        newitem - the item to be added

      • getQuoteForItem

        public void getQuoteForItem​(WatchlistItem w)
        Pull a quote for the given item, and write the result into the same item.
        Parameters:
        w - the WatchlistItem for which a quote is requested

      • getNewQuotes

        public void getNewQuotes()
        Pulls a new quote for all watched items, e.g. when switching data provider. This is done non-blocking in separate threads.

      • updateItem

        public void updateItem​(java.lang.String key,
                       long time,
                       double price)
        Update the item with the given key to the given time and price.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the WatchlistItem to be updated
        time - the unix timestamp at which the latest price is valid
        price - the latest price

      • removeFromWatchlist

        public void removeFromWatchlist​(int index)
        Remove the item at the given postion (index) from the watchlist.
        Parameters:
        index - the position (index) of the item to be removed

      • removeFromWatchlist

        public void removeFromWatchlist​(java.lang.String key)
        Remove the item with the given key from the watchlist. Not used within Stocker, but required to satisfy the requirements from IStockerTester.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the item to be removed

      • getAllKeys

        public java.lang.String[] getAllKeys()
        Get an array of all keys within the watchlist. Not used within Stocker, but required to satisfy the requirements from IStockerTester.
        Returns:
        an array containing the keys of all items in the watchlist

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the watchlist, i.e. removes all items.

      • onPushUpdate

        public void onPushUpdate​(java.lang.String key,
                         long time,
                         double price)
        Receive a push update for the given key with the given values.
        Specified by:
        onPushUpdate in interface IStockerDataListener
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the item which these data refer to
        time - the unix timestamp for which a new price is reported
        price - the price at the time

      • serializeToJson

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray serializeToJson()
        Serialize the contents of this watchlist into a JsonArray so that it can be reconstructed in the future.
        Returns:
        a JsonArray containing the serialized watchlist content

      • deserializeFromJson

        public void deserializeFromJson​(com.google.gson.JsonArray ja)
        Populate this watchlist by deserializing the content of the given JsonArray.
        Parameters:
        ja - a JsonArray containing serialized watchlist data
